channel.title: Whonix Workstation vs Sun Solaris 10 not working?
channel.description: tried to setup Whonix Workstation on VirtualBox 5.22 in Solaris 10, so it's drop out right when the turning on GUI, right from the first startup - screen appears black just like before loading and then drop before anything appears - shall I config or log smth or there no way to run Whonix over Solaris? xD

item.title: Whonix Workstation vs Sun Solaris 10 not working?
item.dc:creator: DCC
item.description:
here is the log - Gateway works OK, Workstation drops to aborted (no errors) state starting GUI in both Java and Common graphical modes in Solaris…

also running OK with same machine and same distributives, using XP 32 (significant faster than any Linux and even Solaris UNIX Hosts) - Debian 6 32 - Debian 7 32,

only warning dropped by VirtualBox was in Terminal about missing extended keyboard addition in Xserver - but it works with hardcode kb drivers all right, I mean no problem with Gateway and Workstation till GUI…

item.source: Whonix Workstation vs Sun Solaris 10 not working?

item.title: Whonix Workstation vs Sun Solaris 10 not working?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Try running Debian first. If that works, sort it out as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
